titles: An exhortation to the diligent studye of scripture, made by Erasmus Roterodamus. And tra[n]slated in to inglissh. An exposition in to the seventh chaptre of the first pistle to the Corinthians
author: Erasmus, Desiderius, d. 1536.
Roy, William, fl. 1527-1531, attributed name.
Luther, Martin, 1483-1546. aut
publisher: In the londe of Hesse. M.D.xxix. xx daye Iunij. By my Hans Luft [i.e. J. Hoochstraten],
notes: Printer's name from colophon; publication date from STC.
Includes: Luther, Martin.  An exposition in to the seventh chaptre of the first pistle to the Corinthians.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Bible. --  N.T. --  Corinthians, 1st VII --  Commentaries --  Early works to 1800.
